DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect different spinal cord stimulation setting treatment leg pain . Subjects receive randomize order four different program stimulation setting 3 week follow fifth final setting .
DOC.brief_title: Spinal Cord Stimulation ( SCS ) Therapy Study
DOC.criteria: At least 22 year age old time inform consent Implanted Medtronic RestoreSensor RestoreUltra SCS system onlabel indication least 6 month treatment chronic leg pain , without back pain Implanted one Medtronic lead locate epidural space within thoracic area Receiving level pain relief current SCS therapy On stable dose ( new , discontinue change ) prescription pain medication willing maintain decrease dose prescribe pain medication Read understand English without assistance Willing able comply study procedure , study visit , available duration study Diagnosed complex regional pain syndrome ( CRPS ) , peripheral causalgia , reflex sympathetic dystrophy ( RSD ) , causalgia Has leg , knee , foot pain unrelated onlabel indication SCS therapy ( eg , arthritis , knee surgery , etc . ) Implanted surgical percutaneous lead Implanted peripheral lead subcutaneous peripheral nerve stimulation Has following procedure : Neuroablative procedure within six month Neurolytic block within two month Injection therapy pain within four week Sympathetic block within two week Has active implant device ( besides RestoreUltra RestoreSensor neurostimulator ) , whether turn ON OFF Pregnant lactating , inadequate birth control , risk pregnancy study Has untreated psychiatric comorbidity Has serious drugrelated behavioral issue Has active malignancy diagnose cancer remission least one year Has secondary gain , opinion investigator , likely interfere study Participating plan participate another clinical trial enrol study
